name: Proper Detective 2000
description:
Inspired from the many detective boards games: Proper Detective 2000 Solve the murder!
  • The game is simple: read the mystery details and solve one after another the 3 murders visiting the locations you choose.
  • Find clues and question the characters to obtain new info and new leads to follow.
  • You have a map and an address book with some useful locations you might visit.
  • Once you are done with the investigation point out the culprit, read the solution and compare your score!
Useful Suggestions

☛ Choose wisely! ☛
The number of locations you can visit is restricted to a fixed number, only your four advisors won't be counted.
☍ Check the clues closely! ☍
Pictures and items you find can be zoomed. Take your time to carefully review them.
⚠ Don't take anything for granted! ⚠
Not always the characters, even your four advisors, provides truthful information.
⚖ Go back the same way! ⚖
You can read again all the events and get back to all visited locations: sometimes this allows to make new questions and see new events, provided the situation has changed...
⚃ Ask your friends! ⚃
Two heads are better than one, try and solve the mystery with your friends.
